Docs.summary: The namespace contains classes for implementing layout behaviors in your form or control.

remarks.format:
## Remarks The following list shows the classes included in this namespace:
- The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Layout.LayoutEngine> abstract base class is used by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.FlowLayoutPanel> controls for building custom layout engines.
- The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Layout.ArrangedElementCollection> class collects objects that participate in a layout managed by a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Layout.LayoutEngine>.
